name: Rebound RPG
description:
A 2D side-scrolling, turn-based RPG inspired by BBQ Quest, LISA: The Painful, and Paper Mario 64.

You play as Sen, a young, amnesia-riddled man with mysterious powers who awakens on Recovery Isle, a place rife with all manner of thieves, cults, and barrel-wearing weirdos.

Joined by up to five other kooks, Sen is thrust into conflict with a rot that plagues the isle and threatens to corrupt its people. Will Sen be able to put an end to this ancient, yet familiar evil?

Does it even matter?
